item.title: Understanding the Major Diatonic Scale
item.description: In this music theory fundamentals lesson Steve Stine explains the major diatonic scale and shows how several scales are built up step by step.

item.title: How to Memorize the Notes on the Guitar Fretboard
item.description: Erich Andreas breaks down the basic things you need to know to memorize the entire fretboard of a guitar.

item.title: Nirvana - Where Did You Sleep Last Night
item.description: This guitar tutorial by GuitarMadeEZ shows how to play Where Did You Sleep Last Night as performed by Nirvana in 1993.

item.title: Outkast - Hey Ya
item.description: In this guitar lesson Justin Sandercoe teaches how to play Hey Ya by Outkast.

item.title: Pixies - Where Is My Mind
item.description: Learn to play Where Is My Mind by Pixies with this barre chord guitar lesson taught by Drue James.

item.title: Sex Pistols - Anarchy in the U.K.
item.description: This guitar tutorial by GuitarMadeEZ shows how to play Anarchy In The UK by The Sex Pistols.

item.title: Basic Strumming Patterns for Guitar Part II
item.description: This video by Guitar Habits teaches five important strumming patterns in 4/4, 3/4 and 2/4 time.

item.title: 5 DIY Guitar Accessories: Guitar Slide, Capo, Mute, Pick, Pick Holder
item.description: A short video tutorial by MrHardGuitar who teaches how to make Do-It-Yourself guitar accessories: guitar slide, capo, guitar mute (string muter), guitar pick and guitar pick holder.

item.title: Otis Redding - (Sittin' On) Dock Of The Bay
item.description: In this guitar lesson Justin Sandercoe teaches how to play the Otis Redding classic song Dock Of The Bay.

item.title: The Hives - Hate To Say I Told You So
item.description: In this guitar lesson Justin Sandercoe teaches how to play the cracking rock song Hate To Say I Told You So by The Hives.
